front.title: PCEP Extensions for MPLS-TE LSP protection with stateful PCE

abstract.t: Stateful PCE [I-D.ietf-pce-stateful-pce] can apply global concurrent optimizations to optimize LSP placement. In a deployment where a PCE is used to compute all the paths, it may be beneficial for the protection paths to also be computed by the PCE. This document defines extensions needed for the setup and management of MPLS-TE protection paths by the PCE.
